other_tests.date: After diagnosis at age 63 (exact date Not specified)
other_tests.findings: Aphthous ulcers, coagulation necrosis, ischemic perforation, necrotizing lymphocytic venulitis, thrombosis, and serositis
Dramatic remission in fever, marked improvement in oral and genital ulcers, decreases in erythrocyte sedimentation rate (28%) and C-reactive protein level (86%)
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 20 months of daily anakinra (100 mg) and prednisone (5 mg) treatment, the patient remains disease-free.
After stopping green tea, the patient continued taking simvastatin with optimal tolerance for 3 months, then 6 months later was asymptomatic.
